title: Songs of Scotland
creator_credit: International Film Associates, Films of Scotland, Laurence Henson and Edward McConnell
brief_description: An interpretation of familiar ballads and folk songs of Scotland set against scenes from the Outer Hebrides to Loch Lomond and the city streets of Glasgow. The songs include Kishmuil’s Gallery, Loch Lomond, and John Anderson My Jo.
creator_credit_for_label: International Film Associates, Films of Scotland, Laurence Henson and Edward McConnell
